SETTINGS.enableDiceTray.name: Enable Dice Tray
SETTINGS.enableDiceTray.hint: Enable showing a dice tray below the chat message area (requires reload).
SETTINGS.enableDiceCalculator.name: Enable Dice Calculator
SETTINGS.enableDiceCalculator.hint: Enable showing a dice calculator dialog when clicking the d20 icon near the chat box (requires reload).
SETTINGS.enableExtraDiceInSwade.name: Include d20 and d100 in SWADE
SETTINGS.enableExtraDiceInSwade.hint: Enable showing d20 and d100 dice buttons in SWADE (requires 'Enable Dice Tray' reload).
SETTINGS.enableD6Pips.name: Enable d6 Pips
SETTINGS.enableD6Pips.hint: Enables using an alternate d6 icon that includes pips on the die (requires reload).

systemOverride.name: Override system
systemOverride.hint: Override the system used by the dice tray, such as using the dnd5e dice tray which includes advantage and disadvantage buttons.
